title: I Heart Forever
description: Angela Clark is back in a brand new I Heart novel, the long-awaited 7th in the million-copy bestselling series.Angela, Alex and Jenny are back! Just as everyone thinks they’ve settled down, Jenny’s life changes and Angela finds herself in her biggest scrape ever. The brilliant new I HEART novel from Sunday Times bestselling author Lindsey Kelk.
author: Lindsey Kelk
